title: No public parking lots shall generally be more than 500 vehicles
clause_text: No public parking lots shall generally be more than 500 vehicles. However in exceptional cases Commissioner may permit PPL for 1000 vehicles for the reasons to be recorded in writing.
section: a) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lot (PPL) near Metro Stations

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: No public parking lots shall generally be more than 500 vehicles. However in exceptional cases Commissioner may permit PPL for 1000 vehicles for the reasons to be recorded in writing.
